product_name: Leki Legacy Men's Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: The men's Legacy blends innovative technology with comfortable features. Its compact Round Top grips make for smooth on-trail handling while the Super Lock System withstands up to 300 lbs. of force.
short_description: The men's Legacy blends innovative technology with comfortable features. Its compact Round Top grips make for smooth on-trail handling while the Super Lock System withstands up to 300 lbs. of force.
